title: Bug: status bar shows 2 overlapping contents
content:
Pixel 4 Android R.
Basically I've reported this here:
https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/170538196
And I was told to write about it here.
Sadly the issue is no more (gone after a restart) and I have no idea how to reproduce it. I just wanted to report, so that Google will fix it.

The issue is:
After letting the device alone, having some notifications, I turned on the screen, and noticed the status bar has 2 contents on itself.
